00066 using namespace SystemsBiologyWorkbench ;

00069 // Construction/Destruction
00071 
00073 MethodImpl::~MethodImpl()
00074 {
00075         delete handler ;
00076 }
00077 
00085 MethodImpl::MethodImpl(Handler *h, std::string s, SBWOSMutex *m, std::string hp)
00086 : handler(h), signature(s), mutex(m), help(hp)
00087 { 
00088         // check syntax
00089         Signature sig(s);
00090 }
00091 
00098 DataBlockWriter MethodImpl::invoke(Module from, DataBlockReader reader)
00099 {
00100         if (isSynchronised())
00101         {
00102                 SBWOSMutexLock ml(*mutex);
00103 
00104                 return handler->receive(from, reader);
00105         }
00106         else
00107                 return handler->receive(from, reader);
00108 }
00109 
00114 bool MethodImpl::isSynchronised()
00115 {
00116         return mutex != NULL ;
00117 }
00118 
00123 std::string MethodImpl::getSignature()
00124 {
00125         return signature ;
00126 }
00127 
00132 Handler *MethodImpl::getHandler()
00133 {
00134         return handler ;
00135 }
